risk1: goldfino users should be aware of the risks in cryptocurrency markets before making transactions and using goldfino services. Studying this section is intended to inform users about these existing risks, and traders should choose the type of transactions according to their personality and risk tolerance. Obviously, entering the goldfino trading platform and using its services means accepting these terms and being fully aware of the existing risks.
risk2: 1. Trading risk: Users start trading based on their character and accepting the risks in the market, and possible loss is one of these risks that always exists in all financial markets of the world and digital currencies. In fact, as an goldfino user, it should be accepted that due to the existence of very high fluctuations in this area, prices can change drastically in a short time and this will cause profits and losses. How to deal with these sudden changes is directly related to the personality type and character of the trader. So first evaluate your personality and then decide to act
risk3: 2. The only person who is responsible for your trades and profit and loss is yourself, so in order to minimize possible losses, consider all aspects, including news and fundamental, technical analysis, etc.
risk4: 3. goldfino is not responsible for the risk of internet communication and internet outages and such errors that may affect your transactions.
risk5: 4. risk6: 5. goldfino is not responsible for the policies that different countries adopt regarding digital currencies and cause the price to fall or rise, and it is only an Iranian trading platform.
risk7: 6. Investing in digital currencies is a risky investment and sometimes it can threaten your entire capital. goldfino uses the utmost accuracy and sensitivity in selecting tradable cryptocurrencies on its platform. Therefore, all cryptocurrencies are validated and their documents are reviewed and evaluated before being added to the trading markets. But the possibility of any unpredictable scenario in the field of digital currencies is not out of mind (such as the dissolution of the corresponding cryptocurrency project team). goldfino's default is to inform all users about such risks.

tfaHelp1: Two-factor authentication using code generator apps like Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator is a secure method to protect user accounts. After enabling this feature in your account security settings, a code will be displayed that you must scan or enter into the authentication app. The app will then automatically generate a one-time code every few seconds, which you must enter along with your password when logging in.
tfaHelp2: With this method, even if someone has your password, they still cannot access your account because the generated code is also required for login.
tfaHelp3: Store the two-factor authentication activation code in a safe place. This code will be needed to re-enable 2FA and generate temporary codes.
tfaLevel1: Install a two-factor authentication (2FA) code generator app on your phone
tfaLevel11: such as Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator.
tfaLevel2: By selecting the {add} option in the 2FA code generator app, enter the code below.
tfaLevel3: Enter the 6-digit code generated by the app in the field below.

whyGoldfinoCardItem2Text: Experience in online crypto and forex trading
aboutGoldfinoInfoSliderItem1Title: 1) Buying and Selling Bitcoin and Other Cryptocurrencies on Goldfino Exchange
aboutGoldfinoInfoSliderItem1Text: 1) Goldfino is a Bitcoin and cryptocurrency exchange platform. Users on Goldfino can place buy or sell orders for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies to start trading. The Goldfino digital currency exchange has been active in the crypto trading field for over 5 years, offering various services and features across more than 200 trading markets and for over 3000 different tokens and cryptocurrencies.

footerContentText: Goldfino is an exchange for buying and selling Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.In the Ariumex exchange, users can place buy or sell orders for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies, and proceed to trade.
areYouSureToCloseOrderTitle: Are you sure you want to close the order?
backupMarginDescription: With this feature, you can change your liquidation limit in ongoing trades by increasing the margin.
backupMarginDescription3: For every {pl_multiplier} increase in margin, your liquidation price changes by {liq_price}.
backupMarginDescription5: At the price of {market_price}, by increasing the margin by {pl_multiplier}, the liquidation price changes to {new_liq_price}.

forgetTfaConfirmationCodeDescription: We have sent an email containing a verification code to your email address.
haveNotAccessToCode: I don’t have access to the code
lastLoginsDesc: Check the latest login information for your account
makeSureAddressIsRight: Please ensure you are connected to the correct address.
removedTfaDescription: Your account’s two-factor code has been successfully removed. Click the button below to return to the login page.
resetTfaDescription: Enter your email to receive a verification code to reset your Google two-factor code.
tfaDesc: Activate two-factor authentication to enhance your account security
ticketDescription: If your issue is not resolved, submit a support ticket
passwordMin8Characters: Password must be at least 8 characters long
